pages.title: Glowsilk Bow
pages.text: $(li)The Glowsilk Bow is a directly upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l).$(br)$(li)When you fire an $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrow$(/l) with the Glowsilk Bow and this one falls on the ground, the arrow will light up the surroundings.

$(li)If the arrow hits an enemy, it will light up by the Luminance effect.$(br)$(li)A $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombie$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeleton$(/l) hit with an $(l:patchouli:weapons/arrows)Arrow$(/l) fired with this bow, the light of Luminance effect will burn it.
